scripts.test:api: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test api-tests
scripts.test:ui:e2e: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-e2e-tests
scripts.test:ui:e2e:headed: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-e2e-tests --headed
scripts.test:ui:e2e:debug: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-e2e-tests --debug
scripts.test:ui:integration: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-integration-tests
scripts.test:ui:integration:headed: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-integration-tests --headed
scripts.test:ui:integration:debug: set TEST_ENV=production && npx playwright test ui-integration-tests --debug
